nodes.text: Denta bean buns were a bread dessert found on the planet Naboo, eaten by its human population. Denta beans were a major ingredient. Royal Naboo Security Forces officers Quarsh and Mariek Panaka were about to eat some of the buns when a blood sensor triggered an alarm in Queen Padmé Amidala's private quarters. When the two discovered that the Queen and most of her handmaidens had secretly gone out, Mariek told the remaining girl present, Saché, that Panaka was upset at being called away from eating a fresh denta bean bun, which she was skeptical of.

According to a post on author E. K. Johnston's tumblr, the first draft of Queen's Peril had Captain Panaka eating red bean buns instead of denta bean buns. However, the Lucasfilm Story Group asked if Johnston could make the meal "more Star Wars-y," leading her to use Wookieepedia to search for beans unique to Star Wars.
